rules.justification: Rule deactivated: 'Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements.'
You must specify open and close parenthesis after 'UserSecurityId'.
Rule deactivated: 'The name of x is not valid. The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.'
Rule deactivated: 'The name of temporary variable 'x' must be prefixed with Temp.'
Variable 'myUselessLabel' must have a suffix from this list: Msg, Tok, Err, Qst, Lbl, Txt
For pages of the type API the value of properties APIPublisher, APIGroup, EntityName, and EntitySetName should be camel-cased.
For queries of the type API the value of properties APIPublisher, APIGroup, EntityName, and EntitySetName should be camel-cased.
Variable 'i' is unused in 'CheckAndUpdateAppSettings'.
Possible overflow assigning 'Text[100]' to 'Code[80]'.

Variable 'ViewNeoMappingLines' queries the database in 'ViewNeoMappingLinesIdentifierOnBeforeValidateIdentifier' but does not use the queried record. Only find or get record if you need to access the values. Consider using ISEMPTY.
Remember to specify either the 'OnAction' trigger or the 'RunObject' property on an action.
The name of the global variable 'ShowJobDetails' is identical to a field, method, or action in the same scope.
Use of unassigned variable 'AppRec'.
The variable 'MyTotalCustomerHours' is initialized but not used.
Rule deactivated: 'The table Configuration Line does not contain a key with the field x'
The Table Job Resource must have specified ObsoleteState and ObsoleteReason.
The record FinkzeitTaskResource should be modified before saving to the database.
Naming should always be correct.
Rule deactivated: 'Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo.'
Rule deactivated: 'The Tooltip property for x must be filled.'
The Caption property for PageField "Parent Task Code" must be filled in.
Unused methods should be deleted.
The FlowField Duration of "Finkzeit Task Time" should be added to the SIFT key.
The name of non temporary variables 'TempJsonBuffer' must not be prefixed with Temp.
The name of the parameter 'DevopsProject' is identical to a global variable.
The name of the parameter 'FormID' is identical to a field, method, or action in the same scope.
Rule deactivated: 'Variable 'x' with placeholders should have a comment explaining their content.'
Sorting field 'Job Task No.' should be part of the keys for table 'Sales Cr.Memo Line'
Codeunit 'NoSeriesManagement' is marked for removal. Reason: Please use the "No. Series" and "No. Series - Batch" codeunits instead. Tag: 24.0.
Table 'Job Resource' is removed.  This warning will become an error in a future release.
Use of implicit 'with' will be removed in the future. Qualify with 'Rec'. This warning will become an error in a future release.
With should never be used.

The 'StandardSalesCreditMemoJobINN' already defines a built-in member called 'Language'. Choose another name for GlobalVariable 'Language', or it might cause runtime issues. This warning will become an error when targeting a runtime with version '15.0' or higher.
The LayoutFile './src/InnonavSalesNew.rdlc' is already being used. To avoid build issues, a layout file shouldn't be updated by different layouts.
A Blob cannot be used as a source expression for a page field.
Action with name 'Apps' should have a value for the Image property.
The page 'Business Site Env. Type Apps' should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.
The repeater 'General' in page 'Job Activity List' is not supported by the Web client. The Web client does not support displaying repeater controls in pages of type 'CardPart'.
Group "Actions" only contains promoted actions that are not set to PromotedOnly="true".
An error ocurred in a given rule. Please create an issue on GitHub
FlowFields should not be editable.
Commit() needs a comment to justify its existence. Either a leading or a trailing comment.
Do not use an Object ID for properties or variable declarations.
DrillDownPageId and LookupPageId must be filled in table when table is used in list page.
The casing of variable/method usage must align with the definition.
Fields with property AutoIncrement cannot be used in temporary table (TableType = Temporary).
Every table needs to specify a value for the DataPerCompany property. Either true or false.
Filter operators should not be used in SetRange.
Show info message about code metrics for each function or trigger.
Show warning about code metrics for each function or trigger if either cyclomatic complexity is 8 or greater or maintainability index 20 or lower.
Every object needs to specify a value for the Access property. Either true or false. Optionally this can also be activated for table fields with the setting enableRule0011ForTableFields.
Using hardcoded IDs in functions like Codeunit.Run() is not allowed.
Any table with a single field in the PK of type code or text, should have set NotBlank on the PK field.
The Caption of permissionset objects should not exceed the maximum length.
All application objects should be covered by at least one permission set in the extension.
Caption is missing. Optionally this can also be activated for fields on API objects with the setting enableRule0016ForApiObjects.
Writing to a FlowField is not common. Add a comment to explain this.
Events in internal codeunits are not accessible to extensions and should therefore be avoided.
If Data Classification is set on the Table. Fields do not need the same classification.
If Application Area is set on the TablePage. Controls do not need the same classification.
Confirm() must be implemented through the Confirm Management codeunit from the System Application.
GlobalLanguage() must be implemented through the Translation Helper codeunit from the Base Application.
Always provide fieldsgroups DropDown and Brick on tables.
Procedure or Trigger declaration should not end with semicolon.
Procedure must be either local, internal or define a documentation comment.
ToolTip must end with a dot.
Utilize the Page Management codeunit for launching page.
Event subscriber arguments now use identifier syntax instead of string literals.
Use CompareDateTime method in Type Helper codeunit for DateTime variable comparisons.
Set Access property to Internal for Install/Upgrade codeunits.
Set ReadIsolation property instead of LockTable method.
Clear(All) does not affect or change values for global variables in single instance codeunits.
The specified runtime version in app.json is falling behind.
The property Extensible should be explicitly set for public objects.
Explicitly set AllowInCustomizations for fields omitted on pages.
ToolTip must start with the verb Specifies.
Do not use line breaks in ToolTip.
Try to not exceed 200 characters (including spaces).
The given argument has a different type from the one expected.
Explicitly set the RunTrigger parameter on build-in methods.
Empty Captions should be Locked.
AutoCalcFields should only be used for FlowFields or Blob fields.
Use SecretText type to protect credentials and sensitive textual values from being revealed.
Tables coupled with TransferFields must have matching fields.
Zero (0) Enum value should be reserved for Empty Value.
Label with suffix Tok must be locked.
Locked Label must have a suffix Tok.
Use Error with a ErrorInfo or Label variable to improve telemetry details.
SourceTable property not defined on Page.
SetFilter with unsupported operator in filter expression.
Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size.
The internal procedure is declared but never used.
The internal procedure is only used in the object in which it is declared. Consider making the procedure local.
Interface name must start with the capital 'I' without any spaces following it.
The suffix Tok is meant to be used when the value of the label matches the name.
Empty Enum values should not have a specified Caption property.
Enum values must have non-empty a Caption to be selectable in the client
PageVariable.SetRecord(): You cannot use a temporary record for the Record parameter.
Single quote escaping issue detected.
The ApplicationArea property is not applicable to API pages.
Pages of type API must have the ODataKeyFields property set to the SystemId field.
Mandatory field is missing on API page.
Consider naming field with a more descriptive name.
Missing ToolTip property on table field.
Event subscriber var keyword mismatch.
Duplicate ToolTip between page and table field.
Set NotBlank property to false when 'No. Series' TableRelation exists.
Informs the user that there are missing permission to access tabledata.
Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.
Zero index access on 1-based List objects.
The ordinal value '100 'for the EnumValue 'Tasks' is not valid. It should be within the range '[50000..99999]', which is allocated to the application.
